missionSection.title: Mission. Vision. Purpose.
missionSection.subtitle: We are building a resilient logistics network that anticipates the needs of trade partners across the region and beyond.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.body: Deliver flexible and reliable solutions that create measurable value for every customer and stakeholder we serve.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.body: Lead regional liner and feeder operations throughout the Middle East while elevating the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia as a global logistics hub.

purpose.title: Our Purpose
purpose.body: Connect cultures and economies by facilitating sustainable, future-proof trade.

posts.title: Folk Maritime Wins "Rising Star Organization" at MALA Awards 2025

posts.title: Folk Maritime Expands South Red Sea Service with Enhanced Jeddah-Centric Rotation

aboutSection.headline: Folk Maritime Services Company (Folk Maritime) leads as the foremost regional liner and feeder operator across the Middle East and beyond
aboutSection.headDescription:
Folk Maritime Services company was established in 2023 with the mission to connect regional ports seamlessly and catalyze trade across the Middle East, India, and East Africa. Our strategic goal aligns with Saudi Arabia's vision to become a global logistics hub, underlining the Kingdom's premier position in leading multiple high-growth industrial sectors. We are addressing the 'white space' in the region's maritime sector by offering the first-of-its-kind feeder and regional liner shipping services.

Folk Maritime is creating new trade lanes and delivering end-to-end shipping solutions, connecting key transshipment routes in the Arabian Gulf, Red Sea, and beyond by delivering cost-effective and efficient logistics services that drive transformational trade growth.

The word "Folk" in Arabic evokes a deep maritime legacy, symbolizing a large sea vessel traditionally used for transporting cargo and conducting trade voyages, embodying strength, forward movement, and clear purpose, qualities central to our company's vision. Our visual identity draws inspiration from traditional Najdi geometric patterns and maritime signal flags, blending cultural authenticity with themes of communication, navigation, and purposeful progress.
aboutSection.descOne: Folk Maritime Services company, was established in 2023, with the mission to connect regional ports seamlessly, and catalyze trade across the Middle East, India, and East Africa.
aboutSection.descTow: Our strategic goal is aligned with Saudi Arabia's vision to become a global logistics hub, underlining the Kingdom’s premier position in leading multiple high-growth industrial sectors.We are addressing the ‘white space’ in the region’s maritime sector by offering the first-of-its-kind feeder and regional liner shipping services.
aboutSection.descThree: Folk Maritime is creating new trade lanes and delivering end-to-end shipping solutions, connecting key transshipment routes in the Arabian Gulf, Red Sea, and beyond, by delivering cost-effective and efficient logistics services that will drive transformational trade growth.
aboutSection.descFour: in Arabic evokes a deep maritime legacy, symbolizing a large sea vessel traditionally used for transporting cargo and conducting trade voyages, embodying strength, forward movement, and clear purpose, qualities central to our company's vision. Our visual identity draws inspiration from traditional Najdi geometric patterns and maritime signal flags, blending cultural authenticity with themes of communication, navigation, and purposeful progress.
aboutSection.Digitalinnovation: Digital innovation to elevate logistical standards

ceoSection.label: Foreword from the CEO
ceoSection.headline: Saudi Arabia has a strong ambition to harness its strategic geographical position to become a globally connected logistics hub, establishing itself at the heart of multiple industries, including shipping.

body.first: Folk Maritime was born out of this ambition and will play a critical role in making it a reality. The company fills a void in the regional maritime shipping market – offering the first feeder and liner services from Saudi Arabia, with a fleet of ships, including the first-Saudi flag container vessel owned by Folk Maritime.
body.second: Harnessing essential connections with key transshipment routes across the region and beyond, Folk Maritime's liner services catalyze regional trade and create new opportunities for businesses to connect with fast-growing markets in India, the Arabian Gulf and along the Red Sea.
body.third: Our commitment is to provide reliable, future-ready shipping solutions that strengthen the Kingdom's position at the forefront of global logistics.

ceoSection.name: Poul Hestbaek

servicesSection.label: Services
servicesSection.subtitle: Independent feeder operations seamlessly link smaller ports to larger hubs while our end-to-end shipping solutions create new trade opportunities across the region.

logistics.title: Freight and Shipping Logistics
logistics.body: Our coastal and regional liner services synchronize schedules, consolidate cargo, and manage customs documentation so partners stay focused on their supply chain priorities.
logistics.figureAlt: Logistics specialists collaborating during a planning session

routes.title: New Trade Routes from the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia
routes.body: Dedicated feeder routes extend the Kingdom's ports to global networks, accelerating time-to-market for export goods while ensuring reliable connectivity for inbound cargo.
routes.figureAlt: Stacked Folk Maritime containers positioned at a port

technology.title: Integration of World-class Technology
technology.body: Smart port technologies, paperless processes, and real-time visibility tools streamline operations, enabling data-driven decisions across every voyage.
technology.figureAlt: Folk Maritime vessel underway viewed from the bow

careersSection.title: Join Us and Set Sail Towards a Common Goal
careersSection.body: Discover a career path in an environment where diversity is the strength and inclusivity the compass. We empower individuals, embracing varied perspectives to drive innovation and collective success.
